state: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to make an effort to head south. And then, make an effort to go to the west. Then, attempt to venture north. After that, attempt to venture east. After that, move east. Then, try to travel south. And then, make an effort to head east. Then, move east. And then, try to venture south. And then, move west. Then, go to the south. Then, go to the west. After that, make an attempt to go to the south. Once you get through with that, travel west. Next, pick up the coin from the floor of the shower. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Launderette =- You've moved into a standard room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be standard. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the launderette. You start to take note of what's in the room. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. > -= Launderette =-0/1
